label: administered
description: Surgery of the primary site was performed.

label: not planned
description: Surgery of the primary site was not performed because it was not part of the planned first-course treatment.

label: patient risk factors
description: Surgery of the primary site was not recommended/performed because it was contraindicated due to patient risk factors (comorbid conditions, advanced age, etc.).

label: patient death
description: Surgery of the primary site was not performed because the patient died prior to planned or recommended surgery.

label: recommended, not administered, NOS
description: Surgery of the primary site was not performed; it was recommended by the patient's physician, but was not performed as part of the first-course therapy. No reason was noted in the patient's record.

label: recommended, refused
description: Surgery of the primary site was not performed; it was recommended by the patient's physician, but this treatment was refused by the patient, the patient's family member, or the patient's guardian. The refusal was noted in the patient record.

label: recommended, unknown if administered
description: Surgery of the primary site was recommended, but it is unknown if it was performed. Further follow-up is recommended.

label: unknown
description: It is unknown if surgery of the primary site was recommended or performed. Death certificate-only cases and autopsy-only cases.
